title: My phone warns about power-intensive apps. How do I disable apps from running in the background?
answer:
For EMUI 2.0 and EMUI 2.3, go to Settings, select Power saving > Protected apps and then deselect the apps that you don't want to run in the background. 

 For EMUI 3.0, go to Settings, select Power saving > Details > Keep running after screen off and then deselect the apps that you don't want to run in the background.
keywords: drain battery, remove, prevent, battery drain notifications, close battery intensive apps
